favourite.article: This hymn came back to me while driving to work (75' drive each way). Couldn't remember all the words. Thank you www.hymnal.net for providing them... And the piano music! In this day of increasing persecution, this is one hymn I want committed to memory.
Powerful. Learned the song about 18 years ago still as powerful to my soul!
Brings tears to my eyes. BLESS THE LORD GOD. My cup overflows.
What a beuatiful song, giving hope to Christians. God bless.
